title: 3 and Out - Deshaun Demand, Mitch-Burg, Chargers No Excuses, Belichick Contract Philosophy, Free Agency Overreaction
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Deshaun Demand, Mitch-Burg, Chargers No Excuses, Belichick Contract Philosophy, Free Agency Overreaction
description:
John looks at the remaining QB market following the return of Tom Brady, why Deshaun Watson is still in high demand despite his myriad of off-field issues, why Mitchell Trubisky to the Steelers shows how thin the market is, why the Chargers and Brandon Staley have no excuses for not making the playoffs after adding JC Jackson and Khalil Mack, why Belichick was willing to let Jackson walk, and why there's always massive overreaction to early free agent signings across the league,

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
